Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to activate the arcgis environment using various command lines and paths, but all attempts returned errors indicating that the files or directories were not found. Recently, I received a series of messages from my computer indicating that the execute_shell command returned errors indicating that the specified directories or files were not found. These directories included /home/atlas/miniconda3/bin/activate, /home/atlas/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /opt/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, /home/atlas/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh, and /home/atlas/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh.
"""
